text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Kyupy~n!☆
My Umadol sensor is picking you up!
You're the one, I've made up my mind!

...Aah, wait, wait! Don't go!
I'm sorry, please just listen to what I have to say~!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
Listen up, okay?
I have something I'd like you to help me with!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
Actually, it's almost Falko's birthday!
Ah, are you going to celebrate it for me? Thanks so much!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: But, but, Falko is an Umadol, you know. For an Umadol, a birthday isn't just a day to be celebrated by others, you see—
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: "The day to tell everyone who supports me 'thank you'!" In other words—
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
Falko wants to do a Birthday Live!
One that's hugely, ZOOOM-ingly grand!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: That's why, I need you to bring a HUUUGE crowd to the venue by the time of the live show!!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: Falko will also work hard on lessons! I've even put together a super, super, suuuper special menu!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Therefore—I'm begging you!
Please help make this Birthday Live a massive hit with Falko!
